Name.TooLong: $t(Solution) name exceeds maximum length of 60 characters
Name.DuplicateAction: A $t(Solution) with this name and version has already been created. Please change $t(Solution) name or version.

Description.TooLong: Summary description exceeds maximum length of 300 characters

Evidence.Not Selected: requires an option to be selected

File.MissingAction: Please ensure all $t(Capability_plural) requiring evidence have a video uploaded.

Description.MissingAction: Please ensure all uploaded videos have been sufficiently described.
Description.Too Long: has a description that exceeds 400 characters.
Description.Too LongAction: Please ensure all descriptions do not exceed 400 characters.

Submission.Failed: The $t(Solution) failed to be submitted for $t(Capability Assessment).
Submission.FailedAction: Please try and submit the $t(Solution) again.

Update.FailedAction: Please try and update the evidence again.

Upload.FailedAction: Please try and submit the $t(Solution) evidence files again.

Retrieval.Failed: Evidence for the $t(Solution) was not successfully retrieved.

Message.TooLong: The message you have entered must be less than 300 characters.
